Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using the Markdown format.
Here is the summary of the meeting:

CL:
- The Merge testnet has been activated on devnet. 
- There were some issues reported by validators but they have since been resolved.

EL:
- The execution layer's mainnet merge readiness check was completed and it passed all tests, so it will be merged to mainnet.
- Some minor bugs in the CL/EL interface are being fixed before the Merge on mainnet.
